评论概述: Absolute favorite shoes I have ever owned

I really like the joomra barefoot trail shoes so I thought I’d try these out for casual wear, they’re very comfortable and I love the look!

Lightweight, fits exceptionally well (I’m normally 35EU but got the 36….this should be about a 5 women’s shoe ). The value is incredible. My favorite part about these shoes is that it has a heel pad. It also has really good traction on the bottom so if you’re looking for a good, comfortable slip resistant shoe this is it. I also appreciate the style of these shoes! My other “barefoot” or “minimalist” shoes made it look like I had clown shoes on. Somehow these look a lot more normal, even as the toe box has plenty of room. I ordered two more pairs in two other colors because it is SO HARD for me to find shoes that fit well. I’m a PE teacher and am on my feet a lot- these kept me pain free in my feet, knees, hips, and back. Didn’t wake up the next mornings stiff and certainly didn’t have any achey joints. Highly recommend.  I will side note that there is always going to be a transition period for “minimalist” shoes… so if you’re new to this kind of style give your body some time to adjust.

Best wide toe, flexible shoe I’ve tried! I wear them every day, whether it’s just for errands or running around with my toddlers, I can dress them up or down. They’re so comfy and such a great fit. I think I want a dark pair now since the white has got a bit dirty from park visits/jogging etc. Highly recommend though! True to size.

I'm wearing the shoes for walking/running on a treadmill and it was a little tight on me, but I decided to take off the laces and now it's good. They're very comfortable and nice quality material. I like it.

Love these shoes.

评论概述: Very comfortable, great for the price.
评论详情: I bought these because I have grown to love wearing barefoot shoes and had worn through a more expensive pair in a pretty short amount of time.l, less than 7 months.  I wasn't prepared to plunk down another big chunk of change and these gems fit the bill.  I wear them at work and walk anywhere between 3-6 miles per day.  They are holding up great to the abuse.  The only downside I experienced is a bit of an allergic reaction to something in the uppers.  That was only a problem while they were new though.  They're definitely worth the price and continue to look good, other than being stained that is. lol. They are far more resilient than the expensive pair I wore previously.  Highly recommend.

This is my second pair in black because they fit great , wear well, never squeeze your toes and have support. My original pair over 4 years old never showed signs of wear or wear on the sole. My first pair are MIA and had to be replaced. When you consider the comfort, style, slip resistance, support, all weather use, and the value when compared to other shoes of this type they are practically perfect. I will be ordering more colors as they are also great for casual days out. Also if you order half a size larger because of width, the toe box is very comfortable and accommodates your foot to the point you can order your true size. Awesome
Shoes are roomy but not padded for walking. My feet started hurting within 30 minutes of walking.
I did not even take them out of the package.  I normally take 8.5 or 9, I ordered 8.5-9 size.  These were more like 7-7.5 and narrow-medium width even though it says "wide toe box".

When doing search for my size shoe this shoe came up.  I purchased it and received next size up and noticed that is the size that was ordered.  Feels like a bait and switch.The shoe itself is cute, not a truly barefoot feel.
Not sure I liked no tongue on shoe but I love the wide toe box.

If there were such a thing as a footgasam these would cause it! Instant happy feet when I slid the on. They look great, fit great, and look great! All around recommend! I would love some pink ones so more colors would be an awesome addition.
Great once you finally get your foot into the shoe but opening is extremely tight and a struggle to put on.
Love these shoes for work. I’m on my feet a lot and they are so comfortable. Wash well in the washing machine. Will purchase again.

评论概述: Sizing is wonky, but great cheap barefoot shoe!
评论详情: I have low volume, narrow feet and mountain-y toes (second toe is longest, then sloping down). Low volume works perfect for this, but finding my size was darn right irritating. The 8.5-9 said "40" on a sticker when it arrived, for the European size. I had tried the 7.5-8--that said "39". So, bear that in mind.  I will wear them without or without socks, but I'm glad I tried walking around, my toes hit the top of the shoe in the smaller size. I think because the sole is more malleable, your toes move more. Anyway, seem like they'll hold up okay, until I pony up for a fancier shoe!

These do not feel suitable for running at all. The heel was weirdly stiff, and the front was so wide I knew I wouldn’t be able to secure them in a way that would prevent blisters. It still managed to feel too tight across the mid foot.

I got these cause I have to have lots of tie room or my ties go numb. I've only been wearing them a couple days, so far so good. You might want to wear socks with them if you're going to walk a distance. I wear an 8 wide usually in tennis shoes. These are just an 8, just right amount of distance in end of toes. They look kind of big in the toe box, but I'm 73 yrs old & I want comfort. How about you?

Love these shoes!  I have other barefoot shoes that feel a lot more thin and flimsy than these ones. These have a sturdy sole but are still flat and wide.  I use them for running and I’ve started just wearing them on a regular basis. They’re very comfortable highly recommend.
They are so comfortable 100 %

Ordered these not expecting a lot, but wanted to try a different type of shoe…my toes love these! I have wide, flat feet with bunions and hammertoes (I don’t feel comfortable going barefoot) and these were comfortable straightaway, they are now my favorite shoes.  The color is a nice neutral shade too, have received many compliments.  They are snug and I have a little bit of trouble getting them on, but the pull tabs on the heels help with that.  Not shoes to wear with socks.
I like the fit, plenty of room for my wide foot.  Could use an insert for a wee bit more cushion, but definitely a good purchase.
I ordered this for my mom who wears wide shoes.  The shoes look good but we had to return because it’s way too small for her.  I will try getting her the next size up.

These are so comfortable for my wide set feet. I spent years in narrow toe shoes and now that i know the difference ill never go back. As far as these go, tjey are extremely comfortable and i will buy more. I love the zero drop, the soft and flexible material and how much stretch and flexion my feet get when walking in these. Switching to this type of shoe has improved my foot pain so much, and for the price these ones can't be beat!

I have the white version of this same shoe and one in black. No problems with delivery. I’ve tried to order the grey version twice but ran into problems. The first time the grey was OOS and the most recent one I just got was the wrong size and used, dirty soles. I guess I’m just not meant to have these in grey. Still,  they are comfortable and good for “late day wide feet syndrome’ I would buy more but I won’t chance it.

评论概述: I tried them all, even all the expensive ones and these fit the best!
评论详情: I tried all the minimalist, zero drop, wide toe box barefoot shoes and these were the best!  I tried several Altras, Topos, Xeros, Whitin, ETC and I felt like these actually were the most comfortable for my foot shape.  I have wide feet with bunions and it is my life's struggle to find good walking shoes.  I'm on my feet all day and I also try to walk a couple of miles a day to reach my 12,000 step goal.  I heard a podcast about the importance of zero drop, wide toe box shoes with flexible soles that allow the foot to move as it was intended,  and this shoe checks all the boxes.  I recently went on vacation and only brought these shoes so that I would have no choice but to put them to the test.  I logged in ~21,000 to 22,000 steps per day on roads, sidewalks, in museums, etc on hard surface and they passed the test!  They don't have a name brand on them and maybe this bothered me a little, if I'm being honest.  However, at the end of the vacation days, the people I went with all had aching feet, took off their shoes ASAP and rubbed their feet, complaining of pain and normally that would be me as well, but it wasn't thanks to these shoes!  They won me over!!!  I'll be buying another pair soon.  I only wish they had white shoes with white soles that would look nice with a sundress.
Absolutely love love these shoes I am going to purchase another pair since comfortable and fit perfect!!
I love these! I normally wear a 9.5 wide but sized up to the 10 wide and they fit perfectly!  I’ve worn them at least 6 times and once worn all day walking and no foot or leg fatigue.
This was part of a bundle order and I was worried that they would be too small or too narrow. I wear a size 10 and these said 9.5 but they are EU size 41 and a perfect fi. So very comfortable!
LOVE THEM! They accommodate my very wide feet and they’re SO comfortable! Will definitely buy more!

I got the these because I have a neuroma and can’t wear closed toes shoes.  These are actually slip on and hard to get your foot into.  By the time I get my foot in the neuroma is agitated.  Other than that the shoes are well constructed and cute.
Gym weight workouts
I didn’t have a hard time transitioning; will be trying a few different brands but so far so good.

I have had these for a little over a week now and I have worn them everyday all day long. I have extremely wide feet with high arches that I can normally never find correct shoes for. I am someone who is always on their feet and I love to be outside on trails, hiking, walks through the neighborhood, etc. and these shoes are EXTREMELY comfortable. My foot is able to completely and comfortably stretch while walking. I do not recommend sizing up though as some have suggested, they are quite roomy especially after you start breaking them in. I love the fact that there is a thin sole so I am able to feel the ground, however that comes with some negatives as well because there is little protection if you step on a rock lol. They do take some getting used to and after the first couple walks my foot felt like I just put it through a clothes ringer. I have felt the muscles in my feet get stronger in just this short amount of time though. If you have problems with your arches hurting, or just hate tight shoes, I highly recommend, though be warned about the beginning process.

I love to go hiking and I've went through quite a few shoes trying to find the right one. for a long time I've been interested in barefoot shoes, but either the prices were too high or they looked like gloves on your feet which is ugly to me. so I accidentally came across this shoe and I decided to take a chance and wow I'm so glad I did! I've been wearing them for a month now and they only get more and more comfortable. yesterday I went hiking for hours and I totally forgot I even had shoes on. You feel so lightweight and more agile and there's less need to look at the ground because you can feel the ground. it's almost like you have eyes on your feet. I'm also less accident prone while hiking because I don't have extra padding blinding me
Love these shoes, I have bad bunions and have NEVER had a pair of shoes that didn’t cause horrible pain!! But these i can wear all day long, true to size and very reasonably priced
These sneakers are so comfortable. I feel like I don’t have shoes on. I have never had a pair of sneakers that my feet didn’t hurt. I will definitely buy again.
Extremely comfortable shoes. Large toe box, easy to get on and off

评论概述: Love them for zero drop , more barefoot feel
评论详情: I usually wear a 10 and have a wide foot with straight toes, regular high/well defined arches,  and chose the black 10.5 wide to try. Amazing fit and feel. I put these on for the first time on the day I received them-which also happened to be the day I received a cortisone shot in each foot for my first bout of major plantar fasciitis. Some stuff you read says zero drop actually helps with foot issues so I was excited to try them. They are wonderful shoes for biking (lots of grip and room in the toes, breathable but not too cold)! Also I wore them to work with pants (desk job), and also to workout indoors (weights, bike, a little treadmill). I’m not sure yet if I would walk lots and lots of miles in them just yet (waiting for my plantar to heal a bit more) . I already ordered another pair in a different color! Great great price for such a well made comfortable shoe! I absolutely love the padding on the back of the heel (fits me perfect unlike most shoes), lots of width so toes/forefoot is not cramped whatsoever, super lightweight with sturdy grippy sole and some cushion (but can still be responsive to what is under your foot). I also love no tongue (no bulk at all) and the sock-like way it hugs below your ankle. They are secure and don’t flop around at all but they also don’t squish or hurt any area of the foot. I don’t know how they do it but at this price and quality, I will continue to buy. The laces are short. The shoe looks “ok” -probably not gorgeous and mega flattering but at this stage I’m about comfort. They do not add much height at all of course (not an overly cushioned shoe) .
It’s almost impossible to find shoes that have a true wide width and these do.  Please keep offering wide width shoes
First day wearing them, walked over 6000 steps, no pain or discomfort like you do with new shoes normally. They fit perfectly. So comfortable.

评论概述: İ am glad i found this

They are so comfortable and space for my feet. Amazing. The only thing is that if I go to eat at a restaurant sometimes there floors and this shoes are slippery. I love these shoes. I can slip them on and off if I wanted to. They are roomy and my feet don’t feel so cramped in them. They are light and it almost feels like I’m not wearing shoes. If you’re looking for support, these shoes are not it. When I say it’s like I’m not wearing shoes, I mean that in every sense. I have a lot of room and there is no support. However, I wasn’t looking for support and I don’t have a high arch to worry about. I did get some insets to give me some support because I just wanted some. So. I recommend these if you want a light, wide fit shoe that is cute and comfortable. Probably not shoes to wear if you’re doing a lot walking.

I love these shoes! they are so comfortable, breathable, lightweight, well made and really cute!

评论概述: Fantastic shoes, comfort for small but wide feet
评论详情: These quickly became my partner's favorite shoes. Her shoe sizes are 5 wide and has always struggled to find shoes with wide toe-boxes. These were game changers (The 5.5 wide were perfect fit). Toes were no longer being squeezed at. Although the fabric is starting to fray a bit. Would be great if they can improve the quality and durability a bit. Would probably buy more in the future.
Love how they feel putting on out of the package, love the way they fit. Previously purchased others with the same result my feet feel amazing I will order again.

These sneakers are very lightweight.They have a generous toe box and are stylish.  However the sole is bit thin and they are definitely not slip in. I usually wear a 9 1/2 in a sneaker nu ordered a half size larger.  Good thin I did.  So I would say they run small.

I really like these, especially for a medium/low volume foot, but size up at least one size. I’m not sure the size chart is correct. This coupled with the padded bulge in the heel makes them run small.
Love these shoes! Plenty of room for toes. Breathable material. Decent support.

评论概述: Love the wideness, sole leaves more to be desired.
评论详情: I love how wide these are. They are super comfy on the sides of my foot and not feeling like my foot is being smooshed from the sides. It is also comfortable in the aspect of the top of the shoe not squishing down the on the top of the foot. It just feels like there's adequate space for the foot all around. However the sole isn't that thick. I'm not sure how thick it measures but just pressing my finger on the inside I can feel the floor on the tip of my finger. So for wearing these to work standing for long periods of time I'm not sure I'll be able to tolerate it since it feels like I'm basically standing barefoot. However the tread on the soles is 100% I've worn these in super slick winter conditions and didn't slip once! I really do believe these would make great hiking shoes like advertised, I was just hoping to make them work shoes.

I got these for my mother who has wide feet, they fit her perfectly! And they don’t squish her foot at all. They are left! Will be getting more colors!! Wonderful shoes!! She’s a Size 8 and said they fit her great so they are true to size !

I’m happy to report, other than the ugly color, I’m quite pleased with my purchase and couldn’t ask for a more comfortable and natural feeling shoe.
